name: Simple Banana Bread
author: Theresa Parker
summary: I developed this recipe because I wanted a bread recipe, not cake-like, while living in a 10-foot trailer.  This recipe is very low in fat.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease one 8x4 inch loaf pan and set aside
In a large bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder, and salt
In another bowl, mash the bananas and stir in the eggs and sugar
Stir in the flour mixture and mix until just combined, then fold in the chopped nuts (optional)
Pour the batter into the prepared pan
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 55 to 65 minutes or until bread tests done
Remove from oven and cool on a rack for 10 minute, then remove from pan and cool completely
